channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Bell Witch & Aerial Ruin Announce New Album Stygian Bough Vol. II: Hear “Waves Became The Sky”
item.description: 🔊 Dive into the haunting sounds of Bell Witch & Aerial Ruin's new album, "Stygian Bough Vol. II" 🖤🌊 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Halle Bailey Is Finally Ready to Release Her Debut Album ‘Love? Or Something Like It’
item.description: 🌟 Get ready to groove with @hallebailey's debut album 'Love? Or Something Like It'! 🎶 Let the countdown begin! 🚀 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Rush add new shows to first tour in over 11 years
item.description: 🎸 Back in action! Rush announces additional tour dates after 11 years! Who's ready to rock out with them? 🤘 #RushOnTheRoad

item.title: Gorillaz Share New Song “The Manifesto” Featuring Trueno and Proof: Listen
item.description: 🎶 Dance into the weekend with Gorillaz' fresh track "The Manifesto" ft. Trueno and Proof! 🔥🎧 #NewMusicFriday #GorillazManifesto

item.title: Olivia, Elton, Doja Cat Set For Rock Hall Appearances
item.description: 🌟 Legends unite! Olivia, Elton, and Doja Cat are bringing the heat to the Rock Hall! 🔥🎶 #musicnews #RockHallBound
